      • appendText

        public void appendText(String text)
        Appends a string to the first empty row of the text area. If the string is too long to be displayed on a single line of the area, then it is split and displayed on multiple lines. Newline '\n' characters result in a new line being appended. Tab '\t' characters are converted to two space ' ' characters.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to append.

      • appendText

        public void appendText(Tile[] text)
        Appends a string of tiles to the first empty row of the text area. If there are no empty rows, then the first row is discarded and all rows are moved up by one row. The text is then appended to the bottom row.
        Parameters:
        text - The new text.

      • setText

        public void setText(int rowIndex,
                    Tile[] text)
        Sets the text contained within a row of the area.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The row index.
        text - The text.

      • clearText

        public void clearText(int rowIndex)
        Clears text from a row.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The row index.

      • clearText

        public void clearText()
        Clears all text from the field.
